metadata.title: CVE-2018-17983 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
cext/manifest.c in Mercurial before 4.7.2 has an out-of-bounds read duringparsing of a malformed manifest entry.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 4.8.2-1ubuntu3
mercurial-common - 4.8.2-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2-1ubuntu3').
